title: All-in-One Salon Dashboard
description: Centralize everything—bookings, services, staff, clients, and AI chats—into a sleek admin panel that’s easy to use, even for beginners.

title: AI-Powered Chatbots (24/7 Assistant)
description: Smart, human-like chatbots respond instantly to clients, take bookings, share offers, and route requests to your dashboard—working for you even after business hours.

title: Lookbook Style Archive
description: Document clients' after-service looks with high-quality photos. Stylists can instantly recall a client’s past styles and deliver consistent, personalized results every time.

title: Smart Client Management
description: Collect and manage client details through AI conversations, bookings, or manual uploads. Each client has a profile with full service history and preferences.

title: Built-in Marketing Engine
description: Send promotions, birthday greetings, or flash deals via WhatsApp or Email. Use your AI chatbot or dashboard to drive engagement and increase return visits.

title: Digital Quote Requests
description: Let clients send service or pricing requests via chatbot. Their queries go straight to your admin panel so you can respond, quote, or follow up professionally.

title: Customizable for Any Salon Size
description: From single-chair stylists to multi-branch salons, Afrobeutic adapts to your team size, branding, services, and hours. Total flexibility, zero compromise.

title: Secure & GDPR-Compliant
description: We value privacy. All client and salon data is securely stored with full compliance to industry regulations—keeping your business protected at every level.

title: Real-Time Insights & Reports
description: Track appointments, client growth, revenue trends, and staff performance with powerful dashboards. Make informed decisions with data at your fingertips.

title: Cloud-Based, No Installations Needed
description: Run your business from anywhere. Log in from mobile, tablet, or desktop—no installations, just access and grow.

title: Onboarding & Support
description: We don’t leave you hanging. Enjoy guided onboarding, tutorial videos, and dedicated customer support whenever you need help.

title: Future-Ready Updates
description: Afrobeutic evolves with the industry. New AI tools, integrations, and features are regularly added—keeping your salon ahead of the curve.
